title: How to Download Images from Google Images

steps.title: Click the image you want to save in the search results.
steps.content: Click the image you want to save in the search results. The image will open in a new tab. You can search for images at https://images.google.com or in the Google app.

steps.title: Tap and hold the image until a menu appears.
steps.content: Tap and hold the image until a menu appears.

steps.title: Tap Save Image on the menu.
steps.content: Tap Save Image on the menu. The image will be downloaded to your phone or tablet's gallery or camera roll. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the image you want to save in the search results.
steps.content: Click the image you want to save in the search results. The image will open in a panel on the right side of the page. You can search for images at https://images.google.com .

steps.title: Right-click the image.
steps.content: Right-click the image. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Click Save Image as.
steps.content: Click Save Image as . Your file browser will open so you can rename the file and change the download location.

steps.title: Name and save the file.
steps.content: Name and save the file. The image will save to your computer once you hit OK in the file browser. [2] X Research source
